entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
